title: Healing (Shattered Heart)
lyrics:
15 Contributors
Healing (Shattered Heart) Lyrics
[Verse 1: Nick]
Break water, you cover my soul, cover my mind
I wanna stay guarded by you
Close quarters, if I'm seeing ghosts, cover my eyes
Back then, I'd pray for it for you
[Pre-Chorus: Nick]
I needed fixing
Out of love, I've been missing
From the land of the living
But you bring me back to life
[Chorus: Nick, 
Nick & Joe
]
Yeah, you
I don't know what you do
But every time that I'm next to you
You healing my shattered heart
Yeah, you
Give me that brand new start
Like I've never been torn apart
You healing my shattered heart
[Post-Chorus: Nick & Joe]
Healing my shattered
Healing my shattered, shattered heart



[Verse 2: Joe]
Slow breathing, you lower my pulse, I need you close
You give it all meaning, you do
Those cold seasons, finally gone, I see the sun
You are the sole reason, it's all you
[Pre-Chorus: Joe]
I needed fixing
Out of love, I've been missing
From the land of the living
But you bring me back around
Through all the darkness
All the meaningless hardships
I was all but discarded
Yeah, but you bring me back to life
[Chorus: Joe, 
Joe & Nick
, 
Nick
]
Yeah, you
I don't know what you do
But every time that I'm next to you
You healing my shattered heart (
My shattered heart
)
Yeah, you
Give me that brand new start
Like I've never been torn apart
You 
healing my shattered heart
 (
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
)
Yeah, you
I don't know what you do
But every time that I'm next to you
You healing my shattered heart
 (
Healing my shattered heart, oh
)
Yeah, you
Give me that brand new start
Like I've never been torn apart
You healing my shattered heart
 (
Ooh
)



[Post-Chorus: Nick & Joe, 
Joe
, 
Nick
]
Healing my shattered
Healing my shattered, shattered heart (
Shattered heart
)
Healing my shattered
Healing my shattered, shattered heart (
Shattered heart
)
